title: How to create AWS free tier account
content:
AWS Provides 1 year Free usage for new users for Learning purpose. you can utilize aws for learning purpose.

Follow following steps :

subContents.SubTitle: 1. AWS Console
subContents.SubContent: Goto aws console https://aws.amazon.com/console/ , Click on Create a free account (see below image for reference).

subContents.SubTitle: 4. Payment
subContents.SubContent: After completing registration you should be able to see payment page. Don’t panic they will just deduct Rs 2 initial charge just to check if your card is valid. They will refund the money back in 4-5 days.

subContents.SubTitle: 5. Phone Verification
subContents.SubContent: After Successful payment you will be redirected to phone verification. Please provide your phone number to get a call from Amazon for Phone Verification.

subContents.SubTitle: 6. After Phone Verification
subContents.SubContent: Once you verified the phone number over the call you will see the following confirmation screen.

subContents.SubTitle: 7. Select a support Plan
subContents.SubContent: Once Verification is done you need to select the Plan. Please select free plan if you want to use free tier service for 12 months ( you need to be careful not every service is free in AWS FREE tier )

subContents.SubTitle: 8. AWS account
subContents.SubContent:
Once you select the free account you will be able to login to AWS account using your email and password you set before.

You will be able to see following screen on successful login to AWS account.
